answers.answer: Difficult to say without evaluation.  The burning sensation can be due to a neurological condition.  A nerve conduction study can help exclude peripheral neuropathy.  Various blood tests can also be done to evaluate for B12, diabetes, and thyroid disorders.I would check electrolytes as well - including the calcium, potassium and sodium levels.These options can be discussed with your personal physician.This answer is not intended as and does not substitute for medical advice - the information presented is for patients education only. Please see your personal physician for further evaluation of your individual case.Kevin, M.D.www.kevinmd.com
